question:
Which of the following statements is / are correct regarding the concept of equality and liberty enshrined in the Preamble of the Constitution of India?
  1. Without equality, liberty would produce the supremacy of the few over many
  2. Equality without liberty promotes individual initiative
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Liberty and equality are concepts which go hand in hand. Without equality, liberty will lead to supremacy of the few over many. And equality without liberty, would kill individual initiative.
